verses.verse: Maschil <WH4905> <WH8688> of Ethan <WH387> the Ezrahite <WH250>. I will sing <WH7891> <WH8799> of the mercies <WH2617> of the YY <WH3068> for ever <WH5769>: with my mouth <WH6310> will I make known <WH3045> <WH8686> thy faithfulness <WH530> to all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>.
For I have said <WH559> <WH8804>, Mercy <WH2617> shall be built up <WH1129> <WH8735> for ever <WH5769>: thy faithfulness <WH530> shalt thou establish <WH3559> <WH8686> in the very heavens <WH8064>.
I have made <WH3772> <WH8804> a covenant <WH1285> with my chosen <WH972>, I have sworn <WH7650> <WH8738> unto David <WH1732> my servant <WH5650>,
Thy seed <WH2233> will I establish <WH3559> <WH8686> for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>, and build up <WH1129> <WH8804> thy throne <WH3678> to all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>. Selah <WH5542>.
And the heavens <WH8064> shall praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thy wonders <WH6382>, O YY <WH3068>: thy faithfulness <WH530> also in the congregation <WH6951> of the saints <WH6918>.
For who in the heaven <WH7834> can be compared <WH6186> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>? who among the sons <WH1121> of the mighty <WH410> can be likened <WH1819> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> ?

'Elohim <WH410> is greatly <WH7227> to be feared <WH6206> <WH8737> in the assembly <WH5475> of the saints <WH6918>, and to be had in reverence <WH3372> <WH8737> of all them that are about <WH5439> him.
O YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> TZva'ot <WH6635>, who is a strong <WH2626> YY <WH3050> like unto thee? or to thy faithfulness <WH530> round about <WH5439> thee?
Thou rulest <WH4910> <WH8802> the raging <WH1348> of the sea <WH3220>: when the waves <WH1530> thereof arise <WH7721> <WH8800>, thou stillest <WH7623> <WH8762> them.

Thou hast broken <WH1792> Rachav <WH7294> in pieces <WH1792> <WH8765>, as one that is slain <WH2491>; thou hast scattered <WH6340> <WH8765> thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> with thy strong <WH5797> arm <WH2220>.
The heavens <WH8064> are thine, the earth <WH776> also is thine: as for the world <WH8398> and the fulness <WH4393> thereof, thou hast founded <WH3245> <WH8804> them.
The north <WH6828> and the south <WH3225> thou hast created <WH1254> <WH8804> them: Tavor <WH8396> and Hermon <WH2768> shall rejoice <WH7442> <WH8762> in thy name <WH8034>.
Thou hast a mighty <WH1369> arm <WH2220>: strong <WH5810> <WH8799> is thy hand <WH3027>, and high <WH7311> <WH8799> is thy right hand <WH3225>.
Justice <WH6664> and judgment <WH4941> are the habitation <WH4349> of thy throne <WH3678>: mercy <WH2617> and truth <WH571> shall go <WH6923> <WH8762> before thy face <WH6440>.
Blessed <WH835> is the people <WH5971> that know <WH3045> <WH8802> the joyful sound <WH8643>: they shall walk <WH1980> <WH8762>, O YY <WH3068>, in the light <WH216> of thy countenance <WH6440>.
In thy name <WH8034> shall they rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799> all the day <WH3117>: and in thy righteousness <WH6666> shall they be exalted <WH7311> <WH8799>.
For thou art the glory <WH8597> of their strength <WH5797>: and in thy favour <WH7522> our shofar <WH7161> shall be exalted <WH7311> <WH8799> <WH8675> <WH7311> <WH8686>.
For the YY <WH3068> is our defence <WH4043>; and HaKadosh <WH6918> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> is our king <WH4428>.

Then thou spakest <WH1696> <WH8765> in vision <WH2377> to thy holy one <WH2623>, and saidst <WH559> <WH8799>, I have laid <WH7737> <WH8765> help <WH5828> upon one that is mighty <WH1368>; I have exalted <WH7311> <WH8689> one chosen <WH977> <WH8803> out of the people <WH5971>.
I have found <WH4672> <WH8804> David <WH1732> my servant <WH5650>; with my holy <WH6944> oil <WH8081> have I anointed <WH4886> <WH8804> him:
With whom my hand <WH3027> shall be established <WH3559> <WH8735>: mine arm <WH2220> also shall strengthen <WH553> <WH8762> him.
The enemy <WH341> <WH8802> shall not exact <WH5378> <WH8686> upon him; nor the son <WH1121> of wickedness <WH5766> afflict <WH6031> <WH8762> him.
And I will beat down <WH3807> <WH8804> his foes <WH6862> before his face <WH6440>, and plague <WH5062> <WH8799> them that hate <WH8130> <WH8764> him.
But my faithfulness <WH530> and my mercy <WH2617> shall be with him: and in my name <WH8034> shall his shofar <WH7161> be exalted <WH7311> <WH8799>.
I will set <WH7760> <WH8804> his hand <WH3027> also in the sea <WH3220>, and his right hand <WH3225> in the rivers <WH5104>.
He shall cry <WH7121> <WH8799> unto me, Thou art my father <WH1>, my 'Elohim <WH410>, and the rock <WH6697> of my salvation <WH3444>.
Also I will make <WH5414> <WH8799> him my firstborn <WH1060>, higher <WH5945> than the kings <WH4428> of the earth <WH776>.
My mercy <WH2617> will I keep <WH8104> <WH8799> for him for evermore <WH5769>, and my covenant <WH1285> shall stand fast <WH539> <WH8737> with him.
His seed <WH2233> also will I make <WH7760> <WH8804> to endure for ever <WH5703>, and his throne <WH3678> as the days <WH3117> of heaven <WH8064>.
If his children <WH1121> forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> my Torah <WH8451>, and walk <WH3212> <WH8799> not in my judgments <WH4941>;
If they break <WH2490> <WH8762> my statutes <WH2708>, and keep <WH8104> <WH8799> not my Mitzvot <WH4687>;
Then will I visit <WH6485> <WH8804> their transgression <WH6588> with the rod <WH7626>, and their iniquity <WH5771> with stripes <WH5061>.
Nevertheless my lovingkindness <WH2617> will I not utterly take <WH6331> <WH8686> from him, nor suffer my faithfulness <WH530> to fail <WH8266> <WH8762>.
My covenant <WH1285> will I not break <WH2490> <WH8762>, nor alter <WH8138> <WH8762> the thing that is gone out <WH4161> of my lips <WH8193>.
Once <WH259> have I sworn <WH7650> <WH8738> by my holiness <WH6944> that I will not lie <WH3576> <WH8762> unto David <WH1732>.
His seed <WH2233> shall endure for ever <WH5769>, and his throne <WH3678> as the sun <WH8121> before me.
It shall be established <WH3559> <WH8735> for ever <WH5769> as the moon <WH3394>, and as a faithful <WH539> <WH8737> witness <WH5707> in heaven <WH7834>. Selah <WH5542>.
But thou hast cast off <WH2186> <WH8804> and abhorred <WH3988> <WH8799>, thou hast been wroth <WH5674> <WH8694> with thine anointed <WH4899>.
Thou hast made void <WH5010> <WH8765> the covenant <WH1285> of thy servant <WH5650>: thou hast profaned <WH2490> <WH8765> his crown <WH5145> by casting it to the ground <WH776>.
Thou hast broken down <WH6555> <WH8804> all his hedges <WH1448>; thou hast brought <WH7760> <WH8804> his strong holds <WH4013> to ruin <WH4288>.
All that pass by <WH5674> <WH8802> the way <WH1870> spoil <WH8155> <WH8804> him: he is a reproach <WH2781> to his neighbours <WH7934>.
Thou hast set up <WH7311> <WH8689> the right hand <WH3225> of his adversaries <WH6862>; thou hast made all his enemies <WH341> <WH8802> to rejoice <WH8055> <WH8689>.
Thou hast also turned <WH7725> <WH8686> the edge <WH6697> of his sword <WH2719>, and hast not made him to stand <WH6965> <WH8689> in the battle <WH4421>.
Thou hast made his glory <WH2892> to cease <WH7673> <WH8689>, and cast <WH4048> his throne <WH3678> down <WH4048> <WH8765> to the ground <WH776>.
The days <WH3117> of his youth <WH5934> hast thou shortened <WH7114> <WH8689>: thou hast covered <WH5844> <WH8689> him with shame <WH955>. Selah <WH5542>.
How long, YY <WH3068>? wilt thou hide <WH5641> <WH8735> thyself for ever <WH5331>? shall thy wrath <WH2534> burn <WH1197> <WH8799> like fire <WH784> ?
Remember <WH2142> <WH8798> how short <WH2465> my time is: wherefore hast thou made <WH1254> <WH8804> all men <WH1121> <WH120> in vain <WH7723> ?

What man <WH1397> is he that liveth <WH2421> <WH8799>, and shall not see <WH7200> <WH8799> death <WH4194>? shall he deliver <WH4422> <WH8762> his soul <WH5315> from the hand <WH3027> of the grave <WH7585>? Selah <WH5542>.
YY <WH136>, where are thy former <WH7223> lovingkindnesses <WH2617>, which thou swarest <WH7650> <WH8738> unto David <WH1732> in thy truth <WH530> ?
Remember <WH2142> <WH8798>, YY <WH136>, the reproach <WH2781> of thy servants <WH5650>; how I do bear <WH5375> <WH8800> in my bosom <WH2436> the reproach of all the mighty <WH7227> people <WH5971>;
Wherewith thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> have reproached <WH2778> <WH8765>, O YY <WH3068>; wherewith they have reproached <WH2778> <WH8765> the footsteps <WH6119> of thine anointed <WH4899>.
Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be the YY <WH3068> for evermore <WH5769>. Amen <WH543>, and Amen <WH543>.
